mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (id, user_id, name, difficulty, barbarian, bard, cleric, druid, fighter, dwarf, elf, monk, paladin, ranger, rogue, wizard, created) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{difficulty}, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, #{createdOn})
mapper.select: SELECT id 'id', user_id 'userId', name 'name', difficulty 'difficulty', barbarian 'barbarian', bard 'bard', cleric 'cleric', druid 'druid', fighter 'fighter', dwarf 'dwarfFighter', elf 'elfWizard', monk 'monk', paladin 'paladin', ranger 'ranger', rogue 'rogue', wizard 'wizard', created 'createdOn' FROM party WHERE id = #{id}
